name: CallAround
tag_list: geo-peering, communications, geolocation, gsm, c2c, yellowpages, social
overview:
Smartphone-based communication service, combining a) voice calls, b) geolocation and c) twitter-like hashtag grouping.

CallAround gives ability to find people geo-closest to you by hashtag (profession or interest or whatever) and voice-call them with your phone. User can become “findable” too.

Example:

  1. User enters tag - for example #taxi
  2. He taps it to find other people around you with tag #taxi or just call closest
  3. Success: he can order a nearby taxi.
  4. Then he taps another button on tag #taxi, stating that other people now can find and call him as in step 2 (he can toggle this state, if he don’t want to be found at the moment)
  5. Success: he is now himself a “taxi driver” - when he wants to.

Service proposes a multitude of social and small business uses - with tags like #girlWantsCinema, #occupySchoolLibrary, #beerNow, #emergencyLawyer, #washMyCarNow etc.

Has Twitter and Facebook integration (profiles, groups, likes).
